explicit

Class ExplicitFiles2Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.PrismComponent
      • explicit.ExplicitFiles2Model

  • public class ExplicitFiles2Model
extends PrismComponent
    Class to convert explicit-state file storage of a model to a model of the explicit engine.

      • build

        public Model build(java.io.File statesFile,
                   java.io.File transFile,
                   java.io.File labelsFile,
                   ModulesFile modulesFile,
                   int numStates)
            throws PrismException
        Build a Model corresponding to the passed in states/transitions/labels files. Variable info and model type is taken from modulesFile. The number of states should also be passed in as numStates.
        Parameters:
        statesFile - .sta file (optional, may be null)
        transFile - .tra file
        labelsFile - .lab file (optional, may be null)
        modulesFile - modules file (normally created with ExplicitFiles2ModulesFile)
        numStates - number of states
        Returns:
        the constructed model
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • loadLabels

        private void loadLabels(ModelExplicit model,
                        java.io.File labelsFile)
                 throws PrismException
        Load the label information and attach to the model. The "init" label states become the initial states of the model. The "deadlock" label is ignored - this info is recomputed.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • loadStates

        private void loadStates(ModelExplicit model,
                        java.io.File statesFile,
                        ModulesFile mf)
                 throws PrismException
        Load the state information, construct the statesList and attach to model
        Throws:
        PrismException
